A feature transferring resources instead of copying them.
A dynamic array container from the STL.
A pattern tying resource lifetime to object lifetime.

questions.question: For C++, "Move semantics" is best described as:?
options: A feature transferring resources instead of copying them.
A pattern tying resource lifetime to object lifetime.
An alias that refers to an existing object.
A dynamic array container from the STL.
